name: Winter Veil Disguise Kit
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target ally you control is also a Snowman this turn.;When a Snowman you control defends against a non-[Fire] hero or ally, remove it from combat.;(received errata)

name: Apothecary Hummel
rules: Hummel has Resistance to each opposing ally's damage type.

name: Spring Rabbit
rules: 1, Exhaust this and another Rabbit ally you control -> Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Bunny Egg ally token into play.

name: Ahune the Frost Lord
rules: When Ahune enters play, he deals 1 frost damage to each opposing hero and ally for this and each other Frost and [Frost] card you control.
